text:
I don't know if you heard, but I'm moving to Iowa!

Thank you, @PolkDems, for putting on a fantastic #SteakFry and giving us the opportunity to bring our campaign directly to Iowans. We're going to win this thing by coming together and fighting for the best of who we are. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBsXkLW4AAa9nF.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175558068995858434/vid/320x320/IdVcjHgLfGx-BXrO.mp4?tag=13

This is a herculean challenge—but it can be done. I know because we’ve done it before. So today, I’m asking for your help. Chip in $5, $10—whatever you can—to help keep my voice in this race: https://corybooker.com/together
@angelicaross @AshleeMPreston I was grateful to meet you, Angelica. You and Ashlee remind me why I’m in this fight.
@stateoftheryan Thank you, Ryan, for your continued support!

RT @SenTedCruz Looking forward to welcoming PM Narendra Modi of India to Houston this weekend to celebrate the culture & contributions of the Indian-American community and the vibrant US-Indian alliance, which is critical to America's national security & energy future.
https://www.statesman.com/news/20190916/trump-to-host-texas-event-with-indias-modi

Grateful for the opportunity to be part of @GLAAD’s #LGBTQForum. In a Warren administration, LGBTQ+ people will be able to be who they are without fear of violence or discrimination. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFA1qIEWkAIlxmu.jpg
@geminimoon Thank you for spreading the word, Damon!

I’m in Colorado w/ @JoeNeguse visiting communities whose air is being poisoned by fracking.

What we’re seeing is appalling. Companies are building fracking sites on public lands, across the street from schools + homes.

Their toxic emissions are invisible. This camera sees them. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1175546386026323969/pu/img/HLxID9yFbxPcsgFv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1175546386026323969/pu/vid/320x568/bw7qf7WpoqG7kkS1.mp4?tag=10

The tot is my staffer’s 1 y/o! I was on holding duty for this stretch of the trip ✈️👶🏽

We are testing new childcare policies on the campaign by covering childcare expenses for traveling parents, or covering travel for children + a partner to join on certain trips.

Wish us luck! https://twitter.com/josephtx/status/1175159622220599296 QT @JosephTX Who was the toddler being carried by @AOC on to a DCA to Denver flight today? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EE8BarHXsAIOzXi.jpg

When they say that breaking barriers isn't possible, don’t listen. It may be painful. It may hurt. You might get cut and bleed. 

But it will be worth it, and we will win. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAStmPXUAEPEEc.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175458869667127299/vid/320x320/n1oBH9k0zLiTXcAZ.mp4?tag=13

RT @JoaquinCastrotx Latino Americans are teachers, soldiers, marchers, and leaders. But most importantly, we are members of this American family – and we have been all along. #HispanicHeritageMonth http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EE8auHOXUAYSqq3.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175184492446801920/vid/480x270/NJayLr0vABTrFHg-.mp4?tag=13

79 million Americans are burdened by medical debt for the “crime” of getting sick. We’re going to eliminate all past-due medical debt. #EliminateMedicalDebt https://berniesanders.com/en/issues/eliminating-medical-debt/

This is what a leader looks like. Thank you, Isabel, for your courageous advocacy on behalf of immigrants facing life-threatening illnesses. I will keep fighting for your right to remain in California to receive the medical care you need. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAhrdgXkAAG9b4.jpg
@believe_women_ Ellen, from the bottom of my heart, thank you. This means the world #Friendship2020
@Lovedrea Thank you, Patti! Deeply grateful

RT @jackmjenkins It’s not insignificant that major politicians like @AOC are visiting undocumented people at risk of deportation who are living in houses of worship — i.e., as part of the New Sanctuary Movement.

This movement is long-standing and persistent, but gets uneven attention. https://twitter.com/conormichael28/status/1175468142878810112 QT @ConorMichael28 I’m at a church in Boulder where Ingrid Latorre, who just had a baby, is living in sanctuary. Reps AOC and Joe Neguse are visiting Ingrid and her children. “Are you proud of mom?” AOC asked Ingrid’s son, who responded yes. “We’re proud of her too.” @AOC @RepJoeNeguse http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAaCXkVUAA8z8w.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAaCXlUwAA2Rtw.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAaCXlUUAUQHGV.jpg

RT @rtraister There are lots of kinds of debt that are immoral, exploitative and deeply unjust (and several presidential candidates are addressing that aggressively) but I could not agree more wholeheartedly with this: Medical debt should absolutely not exist. https://twitter.com/waywardwinifred/status/1175386367754416129 QT @WaywardWinifred Your healthcare should never be a debt sentence and you are not a loan. 

Bernie will #CancelMedicalDebt.  All 81 billion dollars of it. 

https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/21/us/politics/bernie-medical-debt-healthcare.html

#EliminateMedicalDebt https://twitter.com/amy4thepeople/status/1173266636867923969 QT @amy4thepeople @BernieSanders My daughter, Shalynne's, $350k medical bill to die a needless death. Treating her and saving her life would have only cost $1,500.  All because she couldn't provide proof of insurance.
Stopped by Hamburg Inn in Iowa City for a strawberry rhubarb pie milkshake yesterday. Delicious! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFCNn_WXsAUga5x.jpg
In the United States of America, the wealthiest country in the history of the world, one illness or disease should not ruin a family’s financial life and future. #EliminateMedicalDebt

I’m inspired by everyone who made their voices heard during yesterday’s #ClimateStrike—and I was grateful to meet some of them at the Blue Strawberry Coffee Shop in Cedar Rapids yesterday.

Together, we can tackle climate change head-on, and I have a #PlanForThat. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBMX8kWwAUYsl5.jpg

Unions built the middle class, and unions will rebuild the middle class. Looking forward to joining @UAW's picket line tomorrow. I hope you'll join us: http://ewar.ren/UAW-strike #UAWStrike #1u https://twitter.com/UAW/status/1175433712814759936 QT @UAW Thank you to elected leaders across the country who have joined UAW members on strike. This Sunday, 9/22, Senator @ewarren will be joining workers on the picket line  at the Detroit-Hamtramck Assembly Plant at 11:30.

https://facebook.com/events/930872920612140/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EE_6uy8WsAAHCTY.jpg
@AndHamltn @ASDem Thank you so much, Andrew! Grateful for your support
@emilykazakh Emily, thank you for lifting our campaign #WeRise

Today at the @PolkDems Iowa #SteakFry, I said what I’ve been saying since April: It’s time for us to call out Donald Trump’s illegal behavior and start impeachment proceedings—now. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBqkXHXkAAAObt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175555764250927104/vid/320x320/ExCif-0sDnwoy2ku.mp4?tag=13

I loved going to our @TeamWarren house party in Mount Vernon yesterday and listening to what gets people in this fight. As president, I promise to fight for the big, structural changes that Iowa and the country needs. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFCch7OXoAQIxtK.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFCch7OXsAE_0Os.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFCch7NW4AEJdT2.jpg

It’s an unusual move for a campaign like ours to be this transparent, but there can be no courage without vulnerability. I want people to see where we are and understand that we have a pathway to victory, but I can’t walk it alone. https://twitter.com/aseitzwald/status/1175379397702049792 QT @aseitzwald NEWS: In a memo to staff obtained by NBC News, Cory Booker's campaign manager warns "we do not see a legitimate long-term path forward" unless they can raise $1.7 million by the end of Q3 -- 10 days from now.
https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/2020-election/cory-booker-memo-may-not-be-race-much-longer-if-n1057196

RT @glaad .@KamalaHarris talks about her refusal to defend Proposition 8 as Attorney General of California: “I took that position because I am committed to fighting always for equality and fairness.” #LGBTQforum http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1175223312097718273/pu/img/d3ccSNZUODRCwY7c.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1175223312097718273/pu/vid/480x270/UXILqmnwZt-1zhqV.mp4?tag=10

We will rise for health care for all.
We will rise for public schools.
We will rise to end the scourge of gun violence.
We will rise for union labor.

We will rise for one another.

I marched in Las Vegas when it was like 115 degrees. I will march in the rain. I will march in the snow. Doesn't matter the weather, I will #FightFor15 with you, like I did today in Iowa. No one should be made to fight alone. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFADYoUXsAAPOlK.jpg

RT @kylegriffin1 .@AOC on the whistleblower complaint: "We are getting deeper and deeper into a crisis and I think at this point we are beyond a constitutional crisis. This is a threat to the very sovereignty of the U.S., and I can't understate how concerning this is." https://ktla.com/2019/09/20/rep-schiff-threatens-legal-action-over-denied-access-to-whistleblower-complaint/

RT @anna_bahr Nina Dang was billed $20,243 by the Zuckerberg SF General Hospital after a bicycle accident. It's time to #EliminateMedicalDebt bc--and I cannot stress this enough--no one should go bankrupt from falling off their bike. @BernieSanders has a plan for that: https://berniesanders.com/en/issues/eliminating-medical-debt/

Chicago’s nurses fight their hearts out for their patients. They deserve to be treated with respect—and that means adequate staffing levels. I will always stand and fight alongside our nurses. #RNstrike #1u
The fight for LGBTQ+ rights is not new for me. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EE_YtJ-WsAAHp9M.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175392847329206272/vid/320x320/2OnpftrEjHIY3EfH.mp4?tag=13

Volunteers all the way! Our volunteers are the backbone of my campaign. Send a message to @TeamWarren to get involved. https://twitter.com/brandonnadig/status/1175434622378893312 QT @brandonnadig fresh volunteers heading out to fight for big, structural change <3 #WinWithWarren http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1175434526740361217/pu/img/E2YMactxxXhPflO5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1175434526740361217/pu/vid/320x568/1BzvakRbJSED5utP.mp4?tag=10

RT @tylerevansokay The medical bills for my daughter's birth and NICU stay totaled over $100k, and they still follow me to this day. 

Time in the hospital should not mean decades of debt. 

That's why @BernieSanders plan to #EliminateMedicalDebt is so necessary. https://berniesanders.com/en/issues/eliminating-medical-debt/

Boulder brought the house down this morning! 

Big thanks to all the Coloradoans who joined @JoeNeguse and I for a powerful #GreenNewDeal conversation ✨ https://twitter.com/ericmbudd/status/1175421717394518016 QT @ericmbudd I'm in line for the Climate Emergency discussion with @RepJoeNeguse and @AOC #boulder http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EE_vzvzUEAUSYc4.jpg

You inspire me, @GretaThunberg. Activists have always been the driving force behind big, structural change—and yesterday’s powerful #ClimateStrike proved that together, we have a fighting chance at ending our climate crisis. 

Where you lead, I’ll follow. https://twitter.com/GretaThunberg/status/1175198609660399617 QT @GretaThunberg Over 4 million on #ClimateStrike today. In 163 countries. And counting... 
If you belong to the small number of people who feel threatened by us, then we we have some very bad news for you: 
This is just the beginning. Change is coming - like it or not.  #FridaysForFuture http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EE8k585XkAIYDE6.jpg

Visited with local leaders & first responders in Beaumont. Thank you for your leadership in helping Texans following #Imelda’s landfall in Southeast Texas. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBUZrzWwAEWAEY.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBUZr1WkAI3XOk.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBUZr4XkAAbrmB.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBUZr2X4AIRYiA.jpg

One in six Americans has medical debt.

When you get sick, you should focus on getting better — not dealing with debt collectors.

We will eliminate all past-due medical debt in America. #EliminateMedicalDebt

The criminalization of marijuana has been a disaster for communities of color.

We will legalize marijuana, expunge past convictions and invest revenue from legal marijuana back into those communities. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1175550260166430721/img/hDpuqc4ZOoPmHN3Z.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175550260166430721/vid/320x320/dYfUpfIQ_cKPuSrN.mp4?tag=13

When your house is on fire, you don't worry about the cost of calling the fire department.

It's time to do the same with health care. We will pass Medicare for All so no one will be afraid to call an ambulance due to the cost.
We're going to #EliminateMedicalDebt. How would that change your life?

The @NRA has bought Trump — but they can’t buy me. 
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEg78rKWwAA6SaL.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1173252844205629442/vid/480x270/eE5s4yMrC_S3BaFq.mp4?tag=13

Without warning, @GM suspended health care coverage, blindsiding more than 48,000 @UAW members and their families. 

It’s heartless, and hardworking Americans deserve better than this. #StandWithUs
@alainapol22 Thanks for chipping in, Alaina! You're right—it really does make a difference

#EliminateMedicalDebt https://twitter.com/Kirsten0Brien/status/1173314464650686465 QT @Kirsten0Brien I tripped up my stairs in June and broke my ankle. These are my totals between two surgeries and a handful of PT visits. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1173027398356545537 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EEhzSWWUcAEPdYY.jpg
@SJ_Galvez Taking #WeRise literally. Thank you for your contribution!

If you’re all in for me, I can't thank you enough. But if you haven’t settled on a candidate & still think my voice belongs in this race, if you believe the Democratic field should include someone like me, I want you to understand the field may narrow & pay attention to this too.

RT @oh_eyelean When my aunt got breast cancer, that should have been her only concern. Not paying for the $95k bill that came after her first round of chemo, or the bills that keep piling now that the cancer came back. We need to #EliminateMedicalDebt now. https://berniesanders.com/en/issues/eliminating-medical-debt/

We have a corrupt criminal justice system where if you're a kid caught selling marijuana, you go to jail, but if you're a fossil fuel CEO who knowingly destroys the planet and harms thousands of people, nothing happens to you. That's a system I intend to change.

We are being invited into people’s homes. One woman just showed me her recent blood test, which is sky-high in benzene levels. I’m told many others are the same.

Oil and gas co’s are going in hard to lobby+dominate local govs. But the community is organizing to fight back. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBjshSWkAA5jRw.jpg

We need leadership that is prepared to unify our country around our common values, our common goals, and our common aspirations.

Americans deserve unity — not division. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFCMaktWsAEMLJa.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175592789675073536/vid/320x320/4-2SRo8j8Rn9Oc2p.mp4?tag=13

Eighteen Black trans women have been killed so far this year. It’s time for a president of the United States of America to #SayTheirNames. #LGBTQForum http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1175423743629414400/img/RCNzglJXern_rpHX.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175423743629414400/vid/480x270/g-8z7I6qnrkUW1T4.mp4?tag=13

We asked people to tell us their most absurd medical bill. The responses were unbelievable. 

We have got to end the disgrace of medical bills ruining lives. 

We will pass Medicare for All and #EliminateMedicalDebt. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1175399488082587649/img/FHUFPVkv1kesYfnE.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175399488082587649/vid/320x320/tW669lEM4UrVr5g4.mp4?tag=13
At this point, the bigger national scandal isn’t the president’s lawbreaking behavior - it is the Democratic Party’s refusal to impeach him for it.
@datanorms We’re gonna need a bigger tracker!
@jmpalmieri Thanks so much for your support, Jen. Hope you enjoyed your @FongsPizza!

RT @BNeidhardt Medical debt should not exist. 

Here is @BernieSanders' plan to #EliminateMedicalDebt, new this morning:
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/21/us/politics/bernie-medical-debt-healthcare.html
This isn't an end-of-quarter stunt. This is a real, unvarnished look under the hood of our campaign at a level of transparency unprecedented in presidential politics.
@beckystlouis @actblue Thank you, Rebecca!

We’re at a crossroads in this campaign. We need to raise $1.7 million by September 30 to be in a position to build the organization we need to compete for the nomination—and we can do it—but if we don’t, we don’t see a legitimate long-term path forward.

Here is my promise: when we are in the White House we will fight to make sure that no one in America goes bankrupt because they got sick. We will #EliminateMedicalDebt. And we have a plan to do that. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1175404317366542336/img/S6p8eGi7l8r2beld.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1175404317366542336/vid/320x320/Eyej9xjoM2FrBx1N.mp4?tag=13

RT @People4Bernie We shouldn't have to use gofundme to help our friends and neighbors get out from under medical debt, when we are in the White House we will #EliminateMedicalDebt. All of it.

https://berniesanders.com/en/issues/eliminating-medical-debt/ http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1175404573525037056/pu/img/R_VTdXgGMruEft_S.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1175404573525037056/pu/vid/320x626/hxlaKAeZ85725k09.mp4?tag=10

RT @rachelkellertv Senator Ted Cruz visits Beaumont to speak on #Imelda recovery efforts. #409Strong #12NewsNow @12NewsNow http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1175449234490974208/pu/img/4_Tc2qGCHszCip0v.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1175449234490974208/pu/vid/480x270/mcXeyNBK2fJain22.mp4?tag=10

Received a briefing & took an aerial tour of Southeast Texas communities impacted by #Imelda with the @USCG & @TXRandy14. Heidi and I are lifting up in prayer Texans who have been affected by this extreme flooding. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAC9RfXYAAR7Xr.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAC9RfX4AAAMx8.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAC9RfWsAICOw3.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFAC9RfXsAAOYAF.jpg
The largest share of medical debt is held by 27-year-olds who lose access to their parents’ insurance after age 26. We're going to #EliminateMedicalDebt and give people back their future.

Text TOGETHER to 40203 to get daily updates on our progress toward this critical end-of-quarter fundraising goal—we’re going to need your help to make this happen. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EFBB7WsWsAMuiKm.jpg
Getting sick is not a crime. #EliminateMedicalDebt

“I am proud to be in this election that is about many things—and the policy issues are so urgent—but this election is a referendum of spirit. This election isn’t about one guy in one office, it’s about who we are and who we must be to each other.” —Cory at #SteakFry

RT @GunnelsWarren The U.S is the only major country on earth where you can lose your house, car or have your wages garnished because you can't afford to pay a medical bill. That's unconscionable & unacceptable. When Bernie is president we're going to #EliminateMedicalDebt. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/21/us/politics/bernie-medical-debt-healthcare.html?smid=nytcore-ios-share

 Under Bernie’s plan to #EliminateMedicalDebt, they will never again have to fear of going broke from getting sick.
